fields.name: overallPerception
fields.label: How would you rate the overall diversity and inclusion efforts at our organization?

fields.name: inclusiveEnvironment
fields.label: Do you feel that the work environment is inclusive for all employees?

fields.name: diversityAwareness
fields.label: How would you rate the organization's awareness and understanding of diversity issues?

fields.name: trainingEffectiveness
fields.label: How effective are the diversity and inclusion training programs?

fields.name: representation
fields.label: Do you feel there is adequate representation of diverse groups within the organization?

fields.name: supportForDiverseGroups
fields.label: How well does the organization support diverse groups?

fields.name: leadershipCommitment
fields.label: How committed do you feel the leadership is to diversity and inclusion?

fields.name: barriersToInclusion
fields.label: What barriers to inclusion have you observed or experienced?

fields.name: improvementSuggestions
fields.label: Do you have any suggestions for improving diversity and inclusion in the workplace?

fields.name: additionalComments
fields.label: Any other comments or feedback you would like to share?
